Description:
Indicates sign-in from a malicious IP address known to be malicious at time of sign-in.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Malicious IP Address Sign-In Suspicious
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'suspiciousipaddress'
